problem_names:
lemma reduction_language_indistinguishable:
      assumes "R.language \<subseteq> F.language"
      shows "S.language \<subseteq> F.language"
translations:
lemma reduction_language_indistinguishable:
      assumes "R.language \<subseteq> F.language"
      shows "S.language \<subseteq> F.language"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> S.language \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> F.language

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> S.language \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> F.language

proof (state)
this:
  u \<in> S.language

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> S.language \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> F.language
obtain v where 2: "v \<in> R.language" "snth u \<approx> snth v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>v.
        \<lbrakk>v \<in> R.language; (!!) u \<approx> (!!) v\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?u \<in> S.language;
   \<And>v.
      \<lbrakk>v \<in> R.language; (!!) ?u \<approx> (!!) v\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis
  u \<in> S.language

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>v.
        \<lbrakk>v \<in> R.language; (!!) u \<approx> (!!) v\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  v \<in> R.language
  (!!) u \<approx> (!!) v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> S.language \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> F.language

proof (prove)
using this:
  R.language \<subseteq> F.language
  v \<in> R.language

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v \<in> F.language

proof (state)
this:
  v \<in> F.language

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> S.language \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> F.language

proof (prove)
using this:
  (!!) u \<approx> (!!) v
  v \<in> F.language

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<in> F.language

proof (state)
this:
  u \<in> F.language

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (prove)
using this:
  R.language \<subseteq> S.language
  R.language \<subseteq> F.language \<Longrightarrow>
  S.language \<subseteq> F.language

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (S.language \<subseteq> F.language) =
    (R.language \<subseteq> F.language)
